name: Neon Apocalypse Zombie Island
description:
Neon Apocalypse Zombie Island
How to play

Use WASD to move

Q and E to change weapons

And mouse to aim and shoot!


What you can do

Explore a zombie infested island full of strange neon buildings. 

Kill zombies to earn points, then spend the points opening doors and buying weapons (super original right?).

Buy a pistol, machine gun, rocket launcher, and plasma gun!

Find the buggy and drive over the zombies! Take part in a time trial race in the buggy!

The zombies get faster and stronger as the game progresses.

It's very work in progress, but hope you like it so far!
